name: part_000
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage2 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [qBwpM98PXcI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Waiting screen for hololive 5th fes. stage2 DAY1 featuring the event title and a notice that the concert will start soon.
Attention screens for visitors, providing rules and guidelines for the live performance in Japanese and English.
Information slides showcasing official concert merchandise and the details of their sales periods.
A slideshow of fan support message boards for 'Capture the Moment', featuring messages and artwork from fans.

subtitles.original:
公式ハッシュタグ #hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1
The concert will be starting soon.
開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english:
Official Hashtag #hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1
The concert will be starting soon.
Please wait a while until the performance starts.

subtitles.original:
Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
声出し応援 OK です
※マスクの着用はお客様自身の任意でお願いいたします
subtitles.english:
Attention: To all visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is allowed.
*Mask wearing is at the discretion of the visitor.

subtitles.original:
Attention For Visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is ok.
*You are free to wear a mask during the show.
subtitles.english:
Attention For Visitors
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is ok.
*You are free to wear a mask during the show.

オフィシャルグッズ販売期間
当日販売：3月16日・17日

subtitles.english:
Official Goods Sales Period
Same-day Sales: Mar 16–17
Post-event Mail Order: Mar 16 – Apr 30

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「hololive 5th fes. おめでとうございます！全力で応援してます！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Congratulations on hololive 5th fes! We're supporting you with everything we've got!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「みんなのキラキラな姿を楽しみにしてるよ！最高のライブにしよう！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Looking forward to seeing everyone's sparkling figures! Let's make this the best live concert!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「hololive 5th fes. 開催おめでとう！ホロライブに出会えてよかった！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Congrats on the 5th fes! I'm so glad I encountered hololive!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「世界中から応援してるよ！最高の思い出を一緒に作ろう！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Supporting you from all over the world! Let's make the best memories together!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「ステージで輝く姿を目に焼き付けます！頑張って！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"I'll engrave your shining figures on stage in my mind! Good luck!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「ホロライブ最高！一生ついていきます！輝いて！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"hololive is the best! I'll follow you for life! Shine bright!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「5thフェス、全力で楽しんでね！最高の景色を見せてください！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Enjoy the 5th fes to the fullest! Please show us the best view!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「いつも元気をもらってます！これからもずっと応援し続けます！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"You always give me strength! I'll continue to support you forever!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「ついに夢の舞台！全力で駆け抜けてね！大好き！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Finally the dream stage! Run through it with all your might! We love you!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「hololive is the best! 最高の時間をありがとう！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"hololive is the best! Thank you for the wonderful time!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「みんなの歌声が大好きです！ステージ頑張ってね！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"I love everyone's singing voices! Good luck on stage!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「この瞬間を大切にしたい！最高のライブを！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"I want to cherish this moment! Have an amazing concert!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「全力で応援中！みんなが主役！輝いて！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Supporting with all our might! Everyone is a protagonist! Shine!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「応援ボード企画！みんなの想いが届きますように！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Support board project! May everyone's feelings reach you!"

subtitles.original:
Capture the Moment 寄せ書きボード
「一生の思い出にしよう！頑張れホロライブ！」
subtitles.english:
Capture the Moment Support Board
"Let's make this a lifelong memory! Go for it, hololive!"
